validations.required-field: Field cannot be empty! Please fill the input field!

field.cashier-id-help: Please enter the AP code for that cashier where you will place our digital stamper.

help.password-format: The password must be 8-64 characters long, include at least one number, lower and uppercase letter, special character and doesn't includes non-english letters and space.

popup.delete-title: Are you sure about deleting? Deletion is permanent.
popup.discard-title: Are you sure about discarding? It cannot be retrieved.
popup.restore-title: Are you sure about restoring this?
popup.save-title: Are you sure about saving this?
popup.unassign-title: Are you sure about unassigning this

coupon-campaign-create.download-redeemed-coupons-help: This document will be used when they will check the claims while the campaign is running. Also this document will be used at the end of the campaign when they will calculate the commission.

field.banner-link-help: The banner link leads to this website. Campaign landing page (campaign code can be accepted).
field.big-image-help: Only a 360*540 pixel JPG or PNG file can be accepted.
field.category-help: Please select the industry category regarding to your product/service in your offer
field.coupon-count-help: Only a positive integer can be accepted which is less than 1 000 000.
field.description-help: This text will be displayed as detailed information when the coupon is popped up.
field.discount-type-help: Please select whether you want to give the discount as percent or as a fix amount (in HUF)!
field.distribution-end-date-help: The last day of the displaying.
field.distribution-start-date-help: The first day of the displaying.
field.expiration-date-help: The last day when claiming is possible.
field.item-price-help: Product value or average basket value is required.
field.minimum-shopping-value-help: Optional if there's no such condition.
field.mode-help: A campaign can have only one claim mode.
field.name: Coupon name
field.name-help: This will be displayed on the first (collector) coupon image.
field.previous-year-average-basket-value-help: Average basket value or product value is required.
field.rank-help: To set the coupon level please see the currently valid business ToS attachment.
field.small-image-help: Only a 360*270 pixel JPG or PNG file can be accepted.
field.upload-help: Only a 360*270 pixel .txt or .csv file can be accepted. In case of a .txt the values must be separated by semicolons and must be encoded in UTF-8.
field.webshop-link-help: The discount coupon can be claimed at this webshop link.

coupon-campaign-editor.comment-delete-confirm-message: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? Deletion is permanent.
